p: If, as has already been discussed, combustion engines will be replaced by electric engines as in the Zero Emission scenario, further GHG emissions reductions can be achieved. Particulate matter produced by means of abrasion and resuspension remain, while particulates due to combustion disappear, as well as emissions of NO 2. CO 2equ emissions disappear completely (reduction of about 1 or 1.2 million t CO 2equ if electricity is generated carbon-neutrally) and 1500 deaths can be avoided relative to the baseline (displayed separately in Table 10 for air quality and physical activity).
